item.title: Outside vehicle gate of kilburn park school, 24th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London

item.title: Intruder coming out of allotments at 4:15 am, 24th October
item.description:
This is the 2nd time this week someone leaving the allotments during insociable hours. 4:16am is recorded. Clearly not a normal activity and no evidence of entry. Idea has been sent to pencil and police.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath overgrown, 24th October
item.description:
A stretch of approx 100m of footpath is almost completely overgrown. The sign shows that this should be a split use footpath/cycle path. Walking in the cycle path is dangerous, with e-bikes and scooters passing at ridiculous speed and I myself have had several near misses. The footpath should be cut back to the barrier indicated in the photo

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watermead Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
